sentences.en: Bake the mixture for 30 minutes until the top is golden and crunchy.
sentences.cn: 将混合物烘烤30分钟，直到顶部变脆呈金黄色。

sentences.en: Clothes stored in my bedroom froze crunchy.
sentences.cn: 放在卧室里的衣服都冻得硬邦邦的.

sentences.en: Do not meddle in affairs of dragons, because you are crunchy and taste good with ketchup.
sentences.cn: 不要插手凶龙亚兽的事, 因为你是松脆的,而被涂上番茄酱后味道好极了.

sentences.en: Humans are mostly water, with a crunchy bony center.
sentences.cn: 人类就象是水, 当中只有一些很容易碎的骨头.

sentences.en: In 2000, millennium year, we created a new kind of chocolate truffles Crunchy Truffles.
sentences.cn: 在2000年, 首创了创建了一种新的巧克力太妃糖脆脆的太妃糖.

sentences.en: The crunchy kibbles help gently scrub away plaque and prevent tartar build up on the outside.
sentences.cn: 酥脆的颗粒可帮助去除牙斑.

sentences.en: They tasted crunchy and richly flavor of grass.
sentences.cn: 它们吃起来脆爽带浓浓的草香.

words.tran_cn: 嘎吱作响地咀嚼；嘎吱嘎吱地踏过
压碎；嘎扎嘎扎的咬嚼；扎扎地踏过
易碎的；发嘎吱嘎吱声的

trans.tran_cn: 发嘎吱嘎吱声的，易碎的
trans.tran_en: food that is crunchy is firm and makes a noise when you bite it - usually used to show approval
